Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

4.5
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

item.title: Lusso Gear Dog Car Seat Cover for Back Seat, Protects from Scratches, Scuffs, Shedding, Mud, & More, 100% Waterproof, Non-Slip Cover Stays Securely in Place, Fits Your Car, Truck, & SUV (Gray)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)



Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.

4.5
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall Pet Grooming Vaccum

Furever Love Forever Care

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.73 x 12.52 x 7.76 inches; 9.54 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ LM2
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 24, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BHYZV3HY
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

【Dog Clippers & Nail Grinder Used Alone & with Vacuum】Our pet clippers, paw trimmer and dog nail grinder can be used alone, don’t need to connect hose, you can trim your dog anywhere as these clippers are cordless. You also can use clipper with vacuum. Gives you the freedom to groom your pet anywhere in your home or even outside
【Low Noise Design】Our pet grooming vacuum’s noise only 60 dB. 3 adjustable suction levels to choose ,making your pet dogs feel relaxed and not be scared during grooming.
【Easy Empty Dustbin & Easy to Store】With a detachable 1.4L dust box, 25% more capacity than others,easy-to-empty, do not need to empty often during grooming. The removable dust cup is equipped with an easy empty lid for quick, mess-free empty after cleaning.The device is highlighted with space-saving feature, we provide storage boards and bags for easy storage.
【7 in 1 Pro Pet Grooming Kit】oneisall pet grooming kit with vacuum make home grooming easy.It includes 7 proven grooming tools.The grooming brush and the deshedding tool gently remove loose hair and making pet hair shiny and smooth while eliminating tangles. Electric clipper, dog paw trimmer and dog nail grinder provides excellent cutting. Give your pet a best grooming experience. Nozzle head and Cleaning brush can be used for collecting pet hair falling on the carpet, sofa and floor.

Previous page
Next page

1 Pet Grooming Vacuum 2 7 Grooming Tool 3 Low noisy <60dB 4 1.4l Large Dust Cup

Strong suction of 10,000 Pa collects 99% of hair

  1. Sucking all hair when brush


  2. Sucking all hair when triming


  3. Vacuum the pet hair


  4. 1.4l large dust cup


  5. Low noisy <60dB


  6. Easy to store


Dog grooming kit can use without vacuum

Vacuum hair

Vacuum detritus

Removable hose

Give you all you need

item.title: 【Upgrade】 Pet Grooming Gloves – DELOMO Cat Brushes Gloves for Gentle Shedding – Efficient Pets Hair Remover Mittens – Dog Washing Gloves for Long and Short Hair Dogs & Cats & Horses – 1 Pair

item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.99 - ($10.00 / Count)
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:58 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Love Pets Love DELOMO

pet supplies

Delomo was named after two pets. It all began in the summer of 2013 when Matt took a stray kitten home and named her Lomo. Lomo brought Matt a really purr-fect life. Later, they got another partner, an adopted puppy. Matt called him Desko. From then on they three became inseparable friends. They played and napped together. “All pets deserve a safe & loving home”. With this faith in mind, Matt created DELOMO intending to help more fur babies.

What inspires us:

We feel bound to help homeless animals and bring them a better life. All pets deserve a safe & loving home without being abandoned or euthanized.

What we are doing:

Big change starts small. We regularly provide assistance to the American Association of Pet Shelters. We believe that love will make a difference.

Why we did this:

Because we CARE. We care for life and our communities. We’ve been dedicated to sending everlasting love to all our pets, employees, and new fur-baby parents just like you. That’s why we take our products seriously.

Pet Hair Remover

pet grooming gloves

pet grooming gloves

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.2 x 0.5 inches; 4.76 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ delomo002
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 24, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DELOMO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01N9KSITZ

Hair Remover: Perfect for long, short and curly haired dogs, cats, horses, and other pets, grooming the hair quickly, gently and effectively; The shedding hair sticks to the glove, making it easy to peel and throw hair away
Bath Brush: Bathe the pets with this glove, which will clean the pet hair easily and give your pets a gentle massage without hurting their skin; Five finger design allows you to groom hard-to-reach places like tail or face
Skin-friendly: Free from any materials which could cause skin damage; Soft rubber ensure gentle massage and grooming without painful removing of fur or scratching the skin; One size fits all, it has adjustable wrist strap for a comfortable fit
What You Get: 2 blue DELOMO pet gloves (1 left-hand and 1 right-hand; The left-hand glove is customized for left-hander)








Pet Water Fountain
Large Surface Lint Roller
Dog Travel Bag
Pet Grooming Gloves 1PC
Pet Grooming Gloves a Pair
Pet Hair Remover
Color Name White White Grey Blue Green White

Slip on the Delomo pet grooming glove and keep your pet’s coat looking clean and healthy while reducing the hair scattered about the house!

Keeping your dog’s or cat’s coat brushed regularly is important for their overall health, as well as yours – and the Delomo Pet Grooming and Deshedding Gloves make it easier and more efficient than ever before!

Read more

How to use the pet grooming Gloves?

Spray a bit of water on the rubber side.

Start grooming your pet in sweeping motions.

Peel off the collected fur on the gloves.

Clean the gloves by hand or washing machine

Read more

4

(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:58 UTC – Details)
